title: Rancher

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, visit a player to watch over. If an evil player visits them, you load 2 shells into your shotgun.
- At night, spend a shell and choose a player to Guard. You shoot all evil visitors. You will not shoot detection-immune visitors.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You start with 0 shells.
- You can only Guard yourself if you have 3 or more shells. Doing so consumes all 3 shells.

fields.name: Background:
fields.value: - At night, choose a player to protect. If they are attacked, you take the attack instead. Unlimited uses.

desc:

*Everyone's a cattle thief in the dark.*
